IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N' dbo.complete_achievement') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.complete_achievement GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.complete_achievement @character_id dbo.id_t, @achievement_code dbo.code_t, @achievement_point INT, @complete_at BIGINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE dbo.Characters SET achievement_point= @achievement_point WHERE id = @character_id
DELETE FROM dbo.Process_Achievements WHERE character_id = @character_id AND achievement_code = @achievement_code
INSERT INTO dbo.Complete_Achievements(character_id, achievement_code, complete_at) VALUES (@character_id, @achievement_code, @complete_at)
COMMIT
END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
